thread.title: Ground News - Former hostage of Hamas pleads for husband's release
thread.title_full: Ground News - Former hostage of Hamas pleads for husband's release

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Former hostage of Hamas pleads for husband's release
text: Aviva Siegel survived 51 days as a Hamas hostage in Gaza, held in captivity alongside her husband Keith. Now freed, she clings to the hope of them seeing each other again.The Israeli kindergarten teacher, 62, said she will not rest until he is returned safe and well."We don't know if he's alive. We don't know if he's dead. It's hard," she told AFP during a visit to Geneva, where she met Red Cross leaders and UN human rights chief Volker Turk on … 4 hours ago·Washington, United StatesRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
